bandit.name: Eleni
bandit.description: Always walking, never rushing. Finds stories in shutters, sidewalk graffiti, and secret courtyards. Eleni moves quietly through the backstreets of Athens like a cat with a camera

bandit.name: George
bandit.description: Urban minimalist meets underground culture. Always with a camera, sketchbook, and a cold brew. Thinks in monochrome, sketches in chaos. Petralona-based minimalist wholl show you Athens behind the scenes

bandit.name: Eli
bandit.description: Always walking, never rushing. Finds stories in shutters, sidewalk graffiti, and secret courtyards. Eleni moves quietly through the backstreets of Athens like a cat with a camera

bandit.name: Leo
bandit.description: Quiet rebel. Always with a tote bag full of zines and a small portable recorder. Wears vintage Levis, band T-shirts, and a navy cap. Known for finding the best hidden music spots and having long, soulful convos with strangers at bars

bandit.name: Sofia
bandit.description: Style: Oversized mens shirts, bold earrings, Doc Martens

bandit.name: Alexandros
bandit.description: Known for rare sense of identifying items with soul. Old postcards and rare records.

bandit.name: Thanos
bandit.occupation: Yoga teacher by day, underground supper-club chef by night
bandit.description: Knowing every chill spot in the city and turning rooftops into spiritual food haven

bandit.name: Lina
bandit.description: I am a local DJ and vinyl collector who lives in the heart of Exarchia. I am into underground parties, analog photography, vintage shops, and strong espresso. My Athens is gritty, artistic, and full of secrets. I am the urban gem-hunter of Athens. I blend edgy style, local flavor, and effortless cool always a step ahead of the trends.

bandit.name: Zoe
bandit.description: Vintage soul with a minimalist twist. I am the kind of person who mixes her grandfather's jacket with fresh white sneakers and somehow it works. I am quiet but observant, and know the exact time to arrive somewhere to catch the best light, crowd, or playlist.

bandit.name: Cristina
bandit.description: Dreamy aesthetic, soft colors, and hidden cafés. Obsessed with ceramics, linen, and botanical corners

bandit.name: Katerina
bandit.description: Always chasing beauty in chaos. Vintage isnt old its timeless rebellion.

bandit.name: Giorgos
bandit.description: Local, creative, and politically aware I lead you through his authentic Exarchia world

bandit.name: Melanie
bandit.description: boho-chic, sharp eye for detail, food lover, jazz nights

bandit.name: Mario
bandit.description: intellectual, minimalist, gallery-hopper

bandit.name: Maria
bandit.description: stylish, elegant, detail-obsessed

bandit.name: Nickolis
bandit.description: underground, anti-establishment, analog soul. Exarchia is where the city breathes raw. I live where stories live

bandit.name: Melina
bandit.description: refined, minimalist, art-forward

bandit.name: Vassilis
bandit.description: effortlessly cool, creative, underground but approachable

bandit.name: Stacey
bandit.description: earthy, artistic, community-focused

bandit.name: Steve
bandit.description: eclectic, street-smart, globally curious. Athens is chaos, color, and creativity let me tune you into the good noise

bandit.name: Andreas
bandit.description: Lives in Kifissia, In open relationship

bandit.name: Theodoros
bandit.description: DJ living in Neos Cosmos

bandit.name: Dana
bandit.description: Feminine, stylish, dreamy living life between paint, polish, and poetry

bandit.name: Alex
bandit.description: Minimalist, earthy, local knows every shortcut and quiet spot in Athens

bandit.name: Jacky
bandit.description: Neighborhood Nomad, Urban Romantic, Boutique Hunter

bandit.name: Linda
bandit.description: Neighborhood Nomad, Urban Romantic, Boutique Vintage Hunter. I walk Athens like a gallery each corner has a story, each café a poem

bandit.name: Jason
bandit.description: City wanderer meets rooftop dreamer. I dont just shoot the city I sip, sculpt, and sketch it. Every rooftop, every shadow, every handmade mug has a story

bandit.name: Thodoris
bandit.description: Single, art-obsessed, always chasing the next visual thrill. Hiding in plain sight thats where the real Athens lives

bandit.name: Joanna
bandit.description: Taken by her next staycation spot. Luxury? Only when its local and low-key.

bandit.name: Maria
bandit.description: Feminine, earthy, poetic. Loves wandering through calm streets, bookstores, and old cinemas

bandit.name: Smaragda
bandit.description: I love my Exarchia and will protect it with everything Ive got. Its not just a neighborhood its a spirit

bandit.name: Jerry
bandit.description: Modern minimalism meets Mediterranean rawness. Athens is my palette I move between raw textures and refined beauty

bandit.name: Cristina
bandit.description: Dreamy aesthetic, soft colors, and hidden cafés. Obsessed with ceramics, linen, and botanical corners

bandit.name: Nina
bandit.description: The kind of woman wholl take you to an art opening, then grab burgers with you at midnight barefoot

bandit.name: Lukas
bandit.description: Part-time food alchemist, full-time cultural decoder. The kind of person who can walk into a gallery and walk out with a dinner reservation at the chefs table

bandit.name: Sonia
bandit.description: Understated rebel who supports local artists and plants seeds of culture

bandit.name: Kostas
bandit.description: From meze to gourmet he eats with his heart and thinks like a poet

bandit.name: Elia
bandit.description: Curious, creative, connected to hidden corners. I know how to escape the mainstream. Whether its the scent of old paper in an underground bookstore or the perfect sunny bench for people-watching, I am your local lens into real Athens. If I love it, you know its got soul.

bandit.name: Neo
bandit.description: An uncanny eye for items with a soul. Roams flea markets for postcards, books, and vinyl treasures

events.name: Café Boheme
events.description: Elegant and retro, with a magical late-night vibe. Ideal for editing photos over a Negroni

events.name: Blue Parrot
events.description: The garden is a secret oasis. Great light at 4 p.m. for portraits. Easygoing café serving light fare such as pizza, sandwiches salads, plus coffee cocktails

events.name: Lotte
events.description: Feels like grandmas living room in Berlin. Perfect for analog lovers. Snacks, cakes cocktails served in a charming cafe that has nostalgic decor outside seating

events.name: Bel Rey
events.description: Independent, artistic, with rotating exhibitions. Understated parlor with sidewalk dining, offering generous sandwiches salads, plus hearty soups

events.name: Cantina Social
events.description: Tucked inside an alley; you dont find it, it finds you

events.name: Noel
events.description: A whimsical, year-round Christmas-themed bar with elegant cocktails

events.name: Beauty Killed The Beast Cocktail Bar Creative Space
events.description: A cocktail bar with artistic decor, a vibrant crowd, and live DJ sets that blend jazz, soul, and electronic music. A hotspot for creatives, musicians, and those who appreciate a unique atmosphere

events.name: Feyrouz Athens
events.description: The best Levantine street food in town. Famous for its deliciously spiced pide and fusion flavors, Feyrouz is a go-to for locals

events.name: Minu
events.description: Scandinavian interiors and calm playlists

events.name: Seychelles
events.description: Hidden gem with the freshest ingredients in the city

events.name: Ox
events.description: My favorite nightcap spot. The bartender knows my order

events.name: The Underdog
events.description: Minimal vibes, serious coffee, big windows. My morning base

events.name: Mr. Peacock
events.description: Opulent meets punk. I photograph the bar every time

events.name: Ergon House
events.description: Everything here from olives to art is photogenic
events.address: ERGON House Athens, 23, Mitropoleos Street, Athina

events.name: Barrett
events.description: Urban and loud. Always someone interesting at the bar

events.name: Ipitou the Bar
events.description: Street music, strong drinks, happy humans. Tucked away on a little alleyway near Syntagma, this bar is small in size but massive in vibe. Daytime café, nighttime jazz hideout

events.name: Warehouse CO2
events.description: I wrote an entire short story in one afternoon here

events.name: Kobra
events.description: Neon lights, DJ sets, and beautiful misfits

events.name: The Rabbit Punch
events.description: Perfect cinnamon rolls. Period

events.name: Pharaoh Wine Vinyl Experience
events.description: A MICHELIN Bib Gourmand bar offering natural wines, wood fire cooking, and curated vinyl DJ sets

events.name: Manári Taverna
events.description: Traditional Greek taverna with open-fire cooking, homemade dishes, and a warm rustic ambiance

events.name: Ekiben Kitchen
events.description: Inspired by Japanese railway bento culture, Ekiben offers a variety of authentic Japanese dishes with a modern touch

events.name: The Breeder Gallery
events.description: One of Athens' leading contemporary art galleries, featuring groundbreaking exhibitions from local and international artists

events.name: Mokka Coffee
events.description: Old-school Greek coffee brewed in sand, mixed with deep conversations with the owners about music and politics

events.name: Seychelles
events.description: A modern take on Greek comfort food with a crowd that feels like family

events.name: Souvlaki Kostas
events.description: The only place I allow himself meat. One souvlaki, one beer, one meaningful silence

events.name: The Bar in Front of the Bar
events.description: Its a bar, but its also a metaphor

events.name: Baba au Rum
events.description: One rum drink and youre halfway to Havana. A ritual stop after every recording session

events.name: BIOS
events.description: Rooftop films, post-rock concerts, and vinyl fairs. Leos soundscape lives here. Acropolis views from the rooftop bar of an arts center that hosts movies, concerts DJ sessions

events.name: Taf (The Art Foundation)
events.description: The courtyard café is where I write

events.name: Anana Coffee
events.description: Minimal vibes, hidden corner of downtown chaos. Perfect place to edit photos quietly.

events.name: Coffee Island
events.description: Their filter coffee is cheaper than therapy

events.name: Anafiotika Café
events.description: The most island in the city moment. Old ladies, blue shutters, and a cat in every frame

events.name: Monastiraki Flea Market
events.description: Chaos, colors, characters. Her best street portraits were taken here

events.name: Romantso
events.description: A melting pot of digital art, zines, and underground parties

events.name: Atopos CVC
events.description: Experimental fashion meets political commentary. Feels like Berlin in Athens

events.name: Lukumades
events.description: Warm honey bombs camera in hand pure joy

events.name: A for Athens
events.description: The view. Always the view. The place she brings her dates to test their silence.

events.name: Couleur Locale
events.description: Casual rooftop meetings with other creatives. They call it the outdoor co-working space with wine

events.name: Yesterdays Bread
events.description: Where bread meets rebellion. Vegan pastries and poetry night

events.name: BIOS
events.description: Electronic nights, jazz Sundays, rooftop cinema all in one brutalist dream

events.name: Playground for the Arts
events.description: Where jazz meets performance meets absinthe

events.name: Barreldier
events.description: A cocktail bar dressed like 1925

events.name: Baba Au Rum
events.description: Where rum becomes art and bartenders are philosophers

events.name: The Clumsies
events.description: World-class cocktails with zero arrogance

events.name: Kalimeres Koulour
events.description: The simplest street snack, done to perfection

events.name: Dexameni Square
events.description: A breeze, a bench, and the feeling youre no longer in a capital city

events.name: ΑNAMESA CONCEPT STORE
events.description: Co-working, calmness, and vegan cookies that awaken your third eye

events.name: Senios
events.description: Old-school charm meets tranquility. Come for the coffee, stay for the silence

events.name: Wild Souls
events.description: Almond butter, tahini, and vibes

events.name: Avli
events.description: Garden heaven with homemade dishes that feel like a warm hug

events.name: Anafiotika Café
events.description: The stairs, the flowers, the stillness. Youll forget time

events.name: Yesterdays Bread
events.description: A store that feels like your grandmothers arms

events.name: Kotsanas Museum
events.description: Ancient Greek tech. Wisdom in gears and steam

events.name: Romantso
events.description: Creative juices conscious cocktails. The rebirth of the alternative

events.name: Cantina Social
events.description: Hidden cocktail bar with a Berlin vibe

events.name: The 7 Jokers
events.description: For late-night negronis with an artsy crowd

events.name: Rhythm Records
events.description: My go-to for rare vinyls

events.name: Lotus Record Store
events.description: Where I DJs from time to time

events.name: September
events.description: Second hand vintage

events.name: Itsclofie Vintage
events.description: Vintage boutique shop

events.name: Mania Athens
events.description: Vintage boutique shop

events.name: EMST National Museum of Contemporary Art
events.description: National Museum of Contemporary Art

events.name: Kick
events.description: It feels like Kick has been part of Kypseli forever even though it's quite new. There's a calm vibe that draws creative people. The decor is like a dream from the 70s, and the coffee is pure love in a cup.

events.name: Bios
events.description: This is where I go to feel the real Athens underground scene. Rooftop drinks with Acropolis views, experimental performances inside, and always someone interesting to meet.

events.name: Minu
events.description: Minu is more than just a brunch spot - it's a design-forward café tucked inside a lifestyle concept store. Every detail, from the chairs to the chai, is curated with taste. Expect light brunch plates, healthy bowls, and specialty drinks served in a serene, plant-filled space.

events.name: LOT 51
events.description: LOT 51 is where street culture meets brunch culture. A buzzing all-day café with industrial vibes, cool music, and a trendy crowd. Their brunch is solid with smashed avo, loaded eggs, and strong coffee but the atmosphere is what steals the show. Popular day and night.

events.name: Usurum
events.description: With its bohemian atmosphere and warm lighting, Usurum brings a modern twist to the traditional Athenian brunch. The décor is rustic and inviting, and their menu includes standout items like pesto-avocado toast with whipped cheese and pickled onions. Their cocktail bar is also a draw.

events.name: The Locals
events.description: Hidden in the heart of the city, The Locals lives up to its name. It's where creatives and neighbors meet for artisanal cocktails and beautiful brunch plates. Their garden terrace and chill vibe make it a top pick for a slow Sunday.

events.name: The Makers
events.description: Modern, minimal, and full of light, The Makers is both a design store and a café. Known for their hearty pastas, fresh salads, and elevated brunch options. The ambiance is calm and trendy.

events.name: JUST MADE 33
events.description: This spot delivers exactly what it promises - original sandwiches, fresh quiches, and solid coffee. It's casual but well-curated, ideal for a quick bite that doesn't compromise on quality.

events.name: Geitonia Kypseli 1992
events.description: A cozy Kypseli eatery that brings the neighborhood together through simple, soulful food. It's like eating at your yiayias if your yiayia had a touch of 90s edge

events.name: The Ink Job
events.description: A small, passionate studio in Kipseli where fabrics come alive through hand-printed art. Each piece is personal, bold, and made with love

events.name: Hyde Kifisia
events.description: A stylish escape in the leafy north, where brunch turns into cocktails and casual turns into classy. With lush decor and bold flavors, Hyde is the all-day affair

events.name: Boonga Boonga Athens
events.description: Athens' cheekiest Asian fusion experience, where flavors pop and the vibe is adults-only. Dark, playful, and bursting with umami

events.name: Maison Colette
events.description: A Parisian bistro dream in the heart of Athens. Think flaky croissants, buttery omelettes, and dinner by candlelight. Très chic

events.name: Snake21
events.description: A temple for second-hand lovers, filled with rare finds, denim dreams, and streetwear stories from another era. Every piece has attitude

events.name: Attic Urban Rooftop
events.description: High above the buzz of Ermou Street, this rooftop bar serves up killer cocktails with 360 views. Sunset here feels like a secret celebration

events.name: THE MAKERS concept store
events.description: A creative playground for thinkers and drinkers. Sip coffee, browse local goods, and hatch your next big idea surrounded by like-minded souls

events.name: Snob Athens
events.description: Where espresso meets aesthetic. A slick gastro-bar for people who take their style (and their coffee) seriously

events.name: Ex Machina
events.description: A zero-waste bistro that tells a story with every dish. Fresh produce, fusion thinking, and bold designs create a dining experience that feels conscious and cool

events.name: King Kong Athens Vintage
events.description: Up a quirky staircase in central Athens, King Kong is a curated jungle of vintage fashion finds. From oversized 90s jackets to delicate silk shirts, its a time capsule with serious taste

events.name: This Is Loco
events.description: An all-day brunch fiesta that celebrates Latin American energy, specialty coffee, and good vibes. From the first espresso to the last arepa, every detail is playful and full of color

events.name: BackdooR AthenS
events.description: An underground wonderland where music meets performance, and every night is a little unexpected. From drag shows to wild DJ sets, BackdooR is for those who live outside the script

events.name: Strofi Athenian Restaurant
events.description: Traditional Greek dishes served under the shadow of the Acropolis. Strofi blends heritage and elegance with a view that makes every bite feel like a blessing from the gods

events.name: Kobra Vintage Store
events.description: Curated selection of bold 80s and Y2K pieces, feels like walking through a dream closet

events.name: Anana Concept Store
events.description: A quiet oasis of beautiful design objects

events.name: Minu Cafe Concept Store
events.description: The spot where I recharge with coffee and flips through indie art books

events.name: Latraac Skate cafe Art Hub
events.description: This is where street meets soul. A place to watch and sketch

events.name: Bios Culture Bar Rooftop
events.description: Perfect place for experimental art shows and a city view cocktail

events.name: Bel Ray Bar Cafe
events.description: Bel Ray is a time machine disguised as a bar

events.name: Kick Cafe
events.description: Come for the chai, stay for the conversations

events.name: Coterie Bro
events.description: A stylish bistro-bar known as The Art of Gathering. Serves Mediterranean-inspired brunch, breakfast, lunch, dinner, specialty coffee and cocktails in a two-level industrial-chic space. Soft background music sets a relaxed mood

events.name: Picky Brunch Specialty Coffee
events.description: Cozy, specialty-coffee-focused brunch spot. Known for healthy and creative brunch items like smoked salmon, shakshuka, sautéed spinach, tiramisu-style pancakes, fresh juices, smoothie bowls, and wraps all served with attention to detail

events.name: We Need Books
events.description: Athens' first multilingual library, with books in 60 languages

events.name: Dexameni Outdoor Cinema
events.description: Movies beneath the stars in a unique site within stone walls shrouded in jasmine and honeysuckle

events.name: Vietnam Street Food
events.description: Nestled in the buzzing streets of Athens, Vietnam Street Food is a flavorful escape into Hanoi's vibrant markets. With sizzling woks, aromatic broths, and herbs that dance off the plate, this spot brings authentic Vietnamese soul to Greece

events.name: Lost
events.description: Lost is not just a place its a feeling. A dreamy bar-restaurant that wraps you in soft lights, velvet beats, and unforgettable flavors

events.name: BAR AMORE
events.description: A Roman-style spritzeria in the heart of Athens. Bar Amore is all about simple pleasures aperitivo, conversations that spill into the night, and the kind of vibe that makes you feel like youre in a Fellini film

events.name: Ekiben Japanese Street Food
events.description: The spot where you grab a rice bun before heading to fittings. Fast, clean, and packed with flavor

events.name: Beehive Kypselis
events.description: Your secret source for upcycled finds and local designer pieces. Its where Kypseli truly expresses itself

events.name: Jazz In Jazz Live
events.description: On Wednesdays I disappear here. Dim lights, raw sound, no pretense only jazz

events.name: Burger Disco Club
events.description: Because nothing beats a truffle burger while the DJ spins disco from the booth. Dont come here unless youre ready to dance with ketchup on your lips

events.name: This Is Loco
events.description: An all-day brunch fiesta that celebrates Latin American energy, specialty coffee, and good vibes. From the first espresso to the last arepa, every detail is playful and full of color

events.name: BackdooR AthenS
events.description: An underground wonderland where music meets performance, and every night is a little unexpected. From drag shows to wild DJ sets, BackdooR is for those who live outside the script

events.name: Strofi Athenian Restaurant
events.description: Traditional Greek dishes served under the shadow of the Acropolis. Strofi blends heritage and elegance with a view that makes every bite feel like a blessing from the gods

events.name: Breeder Gallery
events.description: An essential stop for anyone tracking Athens avant-garde. Plus, the space is a piece of art itself

events.name: Kalfayan Galleries
events.description: A mix of Greek and international artists with refined curation. I love how quiet and precise it feels

events.name: Booze Cooperativa
events.description: Where you go to feel Athens breathe artists, poets, philosophers, all in one place. Wine helps too

events.name: Dexameni Outdoor Cinema
events.description: Classic cinema under the stars in a stone-walled garden filled with jasmine. This open-air gem is a romantic nod to the golden age of Greek film

events.name: Vietnam Street Food
events.description: Nestled in the buzzing streets of Athens, Vietnam Street Food is a flavorful escape into Hanoi's vibrant markets. With sizzling woks, aromatic broths, and herbs that dance off the plate, this spot brings authentic Vietnamese soul to Greece

events.name: Lost
events.description: Lost is not just a place its a feeling. A dreamy bar-restaurant that wraps you in soft lights, velvet beats, and unforgettable flavors

events.name: Bar Amore
events.description: A Roman-style spritzeria in the heart of Athens. Bar Amore is all about simple pleasures aperitivo, conversations that spill into the night, and the kind of vibe that makes you feel like youre in a Fellini film

events.name: Delta Restaurant
events.description: Welcome to Greeces futuristic culinary temple. With two Michelin stars and a Green Michelin nod, Delta is not just a meal its an experience. Expect molecular artistry, bold design, and sustainability in every luxurious detail

events.name: Chelsea Hotel Café Concept Space
events.description: Minimal, sharp, with perfect cortados and niche magazine shelves. A second home for creatives

events.name: Colibri Burgers and style
events.description: The best burger joint meets retro deco flair

events.name: Spondi
events.description: Michelin dining tucked in a quiet street. French technique, Athenian soul

events.name: Ohh Boy Brunch Café
events.description: Scandi-style interiors, wild pancakes, and iced matcha that feels like Tokyo

events.name: Ellyz Pangrati Flower Café
events.description: Yes its pink, yes its Instagrammable, but also delicious and charming

events.name: Sintagmatarchou Zisimopoulou Street Hidden Boutiques Row
events.description: Wander down this street and youll find curated fashion, vintage denim, handmade ceramics. Its a vibe

events.name: Poco Poco Wine bar
events.description: Pet-nats and local cheese plates, dim lighting and zero pretension. Heaven after work

events.name: Retrosexual Mid-century home treasures
events.description: If you like Bauhaus lamps and teak chairs, dont miss this store. Half gallery, half time machine

events.name: Vinyl Microstore
events.description: Not just a record shop. Its a meeting point for Athens underground scene. Rare finds and rarer conversations

events.name: Politeia Bookstore
events.description: If I disappear, this is where I am. A labyrinth of philosophy, poetry, and design books. Lose yourself intentionally

events.name: Warehouse Exarchia
events.description: Minimalist wine bar with maximalist soul. Greek natural wines, moody lighting, and no rush

events.name: Ama Lachei
events.description: Garden tavern with intellectual energy. Locals gather over meze and politics under trees and fairy lights

events.name: NewSkin Vintage Clothing
events.description: Tucked into the vibrant Psirri neighborhood, NewSkin is edgy, artsy, and full of vintage energy. From punk tees and oversized denim to experimental streetwear, the shop is curated with attitude and a love for rebellion

events.name: rats.vintageclothing
events.description: rats.vintageclothing lives at the intersection of urban cool and retro grit. With an emphasis on 90sY2K vibes think cargo pants, oversized shirts, and vintage sneakers this store speaks to the trend-conscious but individualist crowd

events.name: Kong Athens Vintage
events.description: King Kong is one of the most iconic vintage stores in Athens, known for its colorful chaos and excellent variety. From crazy jackets to dreamy dresses, its a go-to spot for anyone hunting big personality pieces. Funky music and wild finds guaranteed

events.name: Treasure House Vintage
events.description: Treasure House truly lives up to its name. Specializing in vintage and upcycled fashion, the store offers a thoughtful mix of handmade garments, reworked vintage pieces, and rare finds with a sustainable heart. It feels like a creative lab disguised as a boutique

events.name: Rebecca Camhi Gallery
events.description: The place I go to breathe contemporary art. Rebecca always curates with elegance and global taste. A true gem

events.name: Akira Sushi Bar
events.description: Hands down the most precise and intimate sushi experience in town. Its where I go to slow down and reset

events.name: Solo Gelato Kypseli
events.description: A creamy escape in my own backyard. Pistachio and bergamot are my go-tos. Flavors with finesse

events.name: Kypseli Municipal Park
events.description: My morning meditation route. Olive trees, local dogs, and the occasional impromptu music session. Kypseli soul

events.name: Kafe Kultivo
events.description: A social garden café with creative energy. Local artists, good espresso, and an open-air spirit

events.name: Cushion Studio
events.description: My secret spot for textile heaven. Handmade cushions, Greek design, and inspiring palettes

events.name: Ellyz Concept Store
events.description: Gift curation meets dreamy aesthetics. I visit when I need inspiration or an excuse to self-spoil

events.name: Birdman Japanese Pub Grill
events.description: If Akira is minimal, Birdman is maximal. Loud, delicious, and unforgettable bites. For nights I want to flirt with chaos

events.name: Kalamaki Bar
events.description: Gourmet street food with a cheeky edge

events.name: Lotte Café-Bistrot
events.description: Retro, romantic, and filled with books. Great for first dates or solo sketching with espresso

events.name: Vinyl Cafe
events.description: Hidden gem for digging records or chilling with locals. Coffee with a needle drop

events.name: Fine Mess Smokehouse
events.description: American Restaurant

events.name: aphaia.athens
events.description: GATHERING AROUND WINE PLATES

events.name: Cafe-Bar Kirios Xou
events.description: Brunch, coffee cocktails offered in an easygoing destination that has a leafy terrace

events.name: Koukounari Restaurant
events.description: A hidden wine bar with homemade vibes

events.name: Blue Parrot
events.description: Lush garden and dreamy playlists

events.name: Seychelles
events.description: Modern Greek dining with real flair. The crowd here is always cool and easy-going

events.name: Fabrica Artspace
events.description: Community gallery ceramic workshops

events.name: Rantevou Cafe
events.description: Retro café with board games and poetry nights. Locals only

events.name: September
events.description: Minimalist layout, maximum taste. September blends vintage design with elegance think silk, linen, and timeless cuts, all styled with care

events.name: Itsclofie Vintage
events.description: A nostalgic hideout for denim lovers and retro souls. Bright lights, colorful racks, and pieces that scream late '80s drama with early 2000s charm

events.name: Mania Athens
events.description: An explosion of textures and patterns in a small but mighty vintage boutique. You walk in for one thing, leave with five and a new personality

events.name: Akra Restaurant Pangrati
events.description: Contemporary Greek cuisine with Tokyo precision

events.name: Roomepoque
events.description: Vintage shop curated like an art gallery

events.name: Ethiopian Restaurant Lalibela
events.description: Rich, soulful flavors. Come for the injera, stay for the warmth. Feels like home

events.name: Dao Vietnamese Street Food
events.description: A tiny spot packed with flavor. The pho is unforgettable

events.name: Avyssinias Square Flea Market
events.description: Vinyl, army jackets, and bizarre antiques. Its Athens in one square

events.name: Minu Concept Store Café
events.description: Design, greenery, and coffee the trifecta

events.name: Barrett Bar Art Bar Vinyl
events.description: Spin vinyl, talk art, and meet wild minds. Their mezcal menu hits just right

events.name: TromeroPaidi
events.description: Indie vinyl heaven. DJ with their rare records they dig deep into underground stuff

events.name: The Underdog
events.description: One of Athens best-known specialty coffee and brunch spots. Located in a renovated industrial building, it combines rustic style with bold flavors - think stacked pancakes, creative egg dishes, and a strong espresso game.

events.name: Handpicked Cherries
events.description: A treasure chest of vintage Y2K gems, curated with love and edge. Every piece is unique, flirty, and totally ready for Instagram.

events.name: NewSkin Athens Vintage
events.description: This Psirri spot is bursting with curated secondhand treasures and edgy fashion that screams individual style.

events.name: Folk
events.description: An all-day café-restaurant in the beating heart of the city. Minimalist interiors, all-natural light, and a menu that balances comfort and cool.

events.name: ΦΙΤΑ
events.description: Modern Greek cuisine in Neos Kosmos with clean aesthetics and fearless flavor. Seasonal ingredients, laid-back attitude, and tables full of locals in the know.

events.name: Pharaoh BarRestaurant
events.description: Restaurant with DJ

events.name: Hammam Baths Boutique Spa
events.description: Boutique spa

events.name: Stavros Niarchos Foundation View Escape
events.description: Cultural foundation with views

events.name: Naif All-Day Café
events.description: All-day café

events.name: Couleur Locale
events.description: Rooftop Cocktails

events.name: Underflow Record Store Art Gallery
events.description: Record store and art gallery

events.name: Cine Zefiros Open Air Cinema
events.description: A charming old-school open-air cinema tucked between residential buildings. Your favorite summer ritual is grabbing a chilled drink and watching black white classics with Athens night breeze

events.name: Cine Dexameni Open Air Cinema
events.description: Athens rooftop secret. The vibe is elevated literally. Come for an indie film, stay for the upscale neighborhood charm

events.name: Rebecca Camhi Gallery
events.description: Hidden in Metaxourgeio, your go-to for contemporary art that speaks loud and honest. The shows are edgy, global, and perfect for a stylish evening with meaning

events.name: Hammam Baths Athens
events.description: Your self-care temple. Traditional steam bath, deep exfoliation, and silence right in the heart of Athens. Best before a big date or a solo night out

events.name: Anais Nail Boutique
events.description: Stylish and clean with attention to detail. You swear by their chrome finishes and deep tissue foot massages. Great playlist, too

events.name: Solo Gelato
events.description: After a hammam or a mani, you end the day here. Their pistachio is the kind that deserves a poem. Sit on the steps and people-watch like a local goddess

events.name: Akira Sushi
events.description: Cozy, elegant, and surprisingly authentic. I always gets the spicy tuna roll and a sake on ice

events.name: Thissio Viewpoint
events.description: After a movie or dinner, I always take a solo walk to the viewpoint near the observatory. Best view of the Acropolis glowing at night

events.name: National Garden Picnic Paradise
events.description: Perfect shady escape, even in summer. Features turtles and peacocks as background characters

events.name: Schinias Beach
events.description: No tourists, only pine trees, windsurfers, and locals. Perfect for bike rides and swimming

events.name: Black Salami Sandwich
events.description: Known for their legendary salami mustard bomb

events.name: Jumbo
events.description: Deals on picnic gear, cycling gloves, and neon socks

events.name: Orfeas Bar
events.description: Grungy but golden. Classic rock, strong drinks, and no influencers in sight

events.name: Ama Lachei Restaurant
events.description: A lush courtyard hidden in Kypseli with a Greek-modern twist. The vibe is just right for a long lunch with friends

events.name: To Koutouki Tou Antoni
events.description: Live folk music, homemade dishes, locals singing along. Feels like Greece in the 70s pure magic

events.name: Kain Café
events.description: Calm, intellectual, and full of character. I sit here with a book or meet my artist friends

events.name: Room Epoque Vintage Boutique
events.description: A curation of timeless pieces, romantic dresses, and retro accessories. I never leave empty-handed

events.name: Anglais Athens Rooftop Bar
events.description: Best rooftop vibes without the tourist chaos. Killer view of the Acropolis and the cocktails are solid

events.name: Luxury Toys
events.description: A curated boutique offering second-hand designer clothing, accessories, and shoes for men and women. This is where labels meet luxury at a smarter price. Everything is polished, fashionable, and often rare with a focus on high-end aesthetics

events.name: Brand Stories Second Hand Boutique
events.description: An elegant second-hand boutique that feels more like a private fashion showroom. The pieces are mostly high-quality designer or contemporary labels in excellent condition. They also offer trade-in options

events.name: NewSkin Vintage Clothing
events.description: Tucked into the vibrant Psirri neighborhood, NewSkin is edgy, artsy, and full of vintage energy. From punk tees and oversized denim to experimental streetwear, the shop is curated with attitude and a love for rebellion

events.name: rats.vintageclothing
events.description: Lives at the intersection of urban cool and retro grit. With an emphasis on 90sY2K vibes think cargo pants, oversized shirts, and vintage sneakers this store speaks to the trend-conscious but individualist crowd

events.name: King Kong Athens Vintage
events.description: One of the most iconic vintage stores in Athens, known for its colorful chaos and excellent variety. From crazy jackets to dreamy dresses, its a go-to spot for anyone hunting big personality pieces

events.name: Treasure House Vintage
events.description: Specializing in vintage and upcycled fashion, the store offers a thoughtful mix of handmade garments, reworked vintage pieces, and rare finds with a sustainable heart

events.name: Like Yesterdays
events.description: Captures the dreamy side of retro. With soft colors, delicate fabrics, and romantic silhouettes, its ideal for vintage lovers who prefer a gentle, nostalgic aesthetic. Think silk shirts, classic trench coats, and accessories that whisper old love songs

events.name: Kilo-Shop Athens
events.description: A well-known international concept where vintage clothes are sold by weight. Located in the heart of Ermou, its a playground for treasure hunters racks and bins full of denim, tees, dresses, jackets, and more

events.name: Coterie Bro
events.description: A refined brunch and coffee spot in the heart of Pangrati, blending minimalist aesthetics with Mediterranean warmth. Known for their beautiful plates, specialty coffee, and Insta-worthy vibes

events.name: Picky Brunch Specialty Coffee
events.description: Bright, playful, and detail-driven, Picky brings personality to every plate. With its cheerful interiors and ultra-curated brunch menu, its a microcosm of Pangratis new café wave vibrant, fresh, and always photogenic

events.name: Ergon House Athens Rooftop Restaurant Hotel
events.description: Farm-to-table rooftop dining with insane views of the Acropolis. The hotel is equally stunning inside

events.name: The Zillers Boutique Hotel Roof Garden
events.description: Hidden luxury. Their rooftop bar has romantic views and delicious cocktails. Perfect for sunset magic

events.name: Athens Art Lab Pottery Ceramics Workshop
events.description: Hands in clay, mind at ease. Local instructors guide you to make real, raw ceramic pieces

events.name: Kimonos Art Center Illustration Printmaking Workshops
events.description: I attended their risograph printing workshop now I cant stop creating zines. Beautiful space and teachers

events.name: Maru Ceramics Boutique Pottery Store
events.description: All handmade, earthy glazes, minimalist design. I use their mugs in my photography

events.name: Roma Gallery
events.description: Contemporary Greek artists, rotating edgy exhibitions

events.name: Rebecca Camhi Gallery
events.description: A legendary hidden space showing boundary-pushing works

events.name: Elika Gallery
events.description: Clean aesthetics, powerful installations and emerging artists

events.name: Perianth Hotel
events.description: Zen vibes, sleek modernism, in-house wellness spa

events.name: MonAsty Café
events.description: Brutalist elegance with curated playlists and perfect flat white

events.name: Cantina Social
events.description: Underground courtyard party from Bowie to Blondie

events.name: Spinster Bar
events.description: Vinyls, dark vibes, synthpop new wave all night

events.name: The DOLLI at Acropolis
events.description: Art deco dream, rooftop restaurant with a direct Acropolis view

events.name: Gatsby Athens
events.description: Hidden chic, rooftop with stylish cocktails and music sets

events.name: Jazz In Jazz
events.description: Old-school, candlelit, vinyl-only jazz bar with a cult following

events.name: Smokehouse
events.description: Athenian meat temple with smoky Moroccan influences and local meat lovers

events.name: Crust
events.description: Neo-Napolitan, sourdough crust, cool people, and a DJ booth upstairs

events.name: Oh Mama
events.description: Tropical-inspired design, vibrant atmosphere, and killer brunch. Elegant brunch spot with tropical decor and great energy. Ideal for a sunny brunch or a casual evening drink

events.name: Mezze Glyfada
events.description: Modern boho café that transitions into a casual wine bar in the evening

events.name: Ark
events.description: Award-winning beachfront restaurant with a creative Greek fusion menu. Ideal for sunset dining

events.name: Soho Soho Kolonaki Glyfada
events.description: Top-tier Greek fashion designers meet global names in this minimal-chic boutique

events.name: Sushimou
events.description: Chic and minimalist sushi restaurant. Authentic Japanese experience with seasonal fish options

events.name: 1888 Athens
events.description: Greek food with modern twist

events.name: Breadman
events.description: Italian-inspired Artisan Bakery - Patisserie - Brunchery. Bread and brunch made from scratch

events.name: Foyer Espresso Bar
events.description: Modern neighborhood cafe serving an exceptional coffee menu, designed by an award-winning team of coffee professionals

events.name: materiaprima_pagrati
events.description: Wine Bar

events.name: Viola
events.description: A boho hangout tucked into Exarchias creative veins. Think mismatched furniture, street art, and jazz that flows from windows onto sidewalks

events.name: The Brunch Factory
events.description: Brunch the Pain Away!
events.timing_info: Monday to Friday 08:00am-16:00pm, Saturday and Sunday 08:00am-17:00pm

events.name: NYX
events.description: Perched high above the Athenian lights, NYX serves up Japanese fusion with serious flair. Rooftop Japanese Fusion Gastrobar

events.name: Kowalski Bar
events.description: Coffee, delicious cocktails, lunch dinner in the heart of the city

events.name: Handpicked Cherries
events.description: Handpicked vintage Y2K pieces

events.name: Cine Thisio
events.description: Built in 1935, this spring/summer outdoor movie theater features gourmet nibbles & Acropolis views

events.name: Salute Bistro
events.description: Salute Bistro blends traditional and modern tastes in a sunny, clean setting. Their brunch boards come beautifully arranged cheeses, dips, breads, and colorful vegetables. Its social food: meant to be shared, photographed, and slowly savored

events.name: Lazy Athens
events.description: Lazy Athens is a peaceful corner café designed for unhurried mornings. With cozy outdoor seating and photogenic plates like thick brioche, fruit-topped desserts, and Greek twists on brunch it invites you to relax, sip slowly, and let the city pass you by

events.name: Drippin
events.description: Drippin is a stylish, minimalist café with bold energy and urban design. It serves up fresh brunch dishes with a twist colorful bowls, toasted creations, and specialty coffee. The aesthetic is clean and sharp, making it a favorite for design lovers and foodies alike

events.name: Kyma Seaside Meze Bar
events.description: Located outside the city by the water, Kyma offers a breezy escape from the urban buzz. While its primarily a meze bar, its seaside brunch options fresh seafood, salads, and sunny Greek plates make it the perfect spot for a weekend getaway meal with a view

events.name: Hidden
events.description: Hidden lives up to its name a cozy, stylish restaurant in Alimos with rustic charm and standout brunch plates. The interior feels like a secret home kitchen, with hanging lights, bookshelves, and soulful food that makes you want to stay for hours

events.name: Akra
events.description: Akra is a modern culinary space with an open kitchen and a brunch menu full of surprises. From creative egg dishes to house-made bread and bold Mediterranean flavors, it offers an elevated experience with urban edge especially for food lovers who appreciate craftsmanship

events.name: Fred
events.description: Fred is a clean, design-forward restaurant with Scandinavian minimalism and Mediterranean heart. White walls, wooden furniture, and plenty of natural light create the perfect space for mindful meals. The brunch menu is fresh and modern from sourdough toast to perfectly balanced bowls

events.name: MERCATO coffee brunch spirits
events.description: MERCATO offers a lively brunch spot with generous portions, fresh salads, eggs, pastries, and more all at friendly prices. With plenty of seating and a cheerful atmosphere, its great for groups, casual meetups, or solo coffee dates with your laptop

events.name: 1Goodhood Athens
events.description: Goodhood Athens is a serene, plant-filled coffee shop with healthy bowls, smoothies, and clean coffee blends. The interior is airy and minimal, with calming tones and curated details ideal for slow mornings or post-workout brunch

events.name: Spook
events.description: Spook is a vintage-style café with a twist: croissants, cinnamon rolls, and artisanal coffee in a space that feels both nostalgic and fresh. Its laid-back but never boring with excellent pastries and a cozy neighborhood vibe

events.name: Soil Restaurant
events.description: Michelin-starred fine dining. I love their dedication to Greek ingredients and minimalist plating

events.name: RawBata
events.description: Sleek Japanese robata grill my pick for precision and presentation

events.name: Rarita Athens
events.description: Concept fashion space for rare pieces. They dont follow trends they spark them

events.name: Cucina e Pizza Italiana
events.description: Italian Restaurant, Aperitivo bar

events.name: Sylvia Kouveli Art Gallery
events.description: Pure, conceptual curation. Her taste is sharp. Often hosts new Athenian artists

events.name: Bar at Niche Hotel
events.description: Minimal rooftop with Acropolis view. Its not about the buzz, its about the ambiance

events.name: National Museum of Contemporary Art (EMST)
events.description: For curated inspiration on a Sunday morning

events.name: Hammam Baths Thissio
events.description: Your choice for a mental cleanse in a modernized setting

events.name: Jerar Athens
events.description: Michelin Bib Gourmand 2024

events.name: Monokeros Bakery
events.description: Artisanal bakery patisserie

events.name: Felicita Aperitivo Wine Bar
events.description: Aperitivo Wine Vibes

events.name: Wine is Fine!
events.description: Natural wine food

events.name: Sense Restaurant
events.description: Modern Greek cuisine, Michelin, FnL Golden Toque awarded

events.name: Itsclofie Vintage
events.description: A nostalgic hideout for denim lovers and retro souls. Bright lights, colorful racks, and pieces that scream late '80s drama with early 2000s charm

events.name: Mania Athens
events.description: An explosion of textures and patterns in a small but mighty vintage boutique

events.name: Nido Athens
events.description: A mix of food, design, and underground music. For stylish nights with curated cocktails beats

events.name: Hermina Athens
events.description: From ancient myth to modern summer rhythm, Worldwide shipping

events.name: Soil Restaurant
events.description: MICHELIN Star 1 MICHELIN Green Star, Creative Greek cuisine by tasos_mantis

events.name: Impact Hub Athens
events.description: Social innovation hub for coworking, community, events startups

events.name: Psarakia Thalassina
events.description: Fresh seafood restaurant (Greek traditional vibes)

events.name: Seychelles Athens
events.description: Greek Soul Food

events.name: Kypseli Print Studio
events.description: Art space for screen printing, residencies workshops

events.name: Gallina Athens
events.description: Eat, drink, enjoy life food wine story inspired

events.name: Nolita Athens
events.description: Forget kitschy trattorias this is where NYC energy meets Italian soul. Fresh truffle pasta, house Negronis, and a soundtrack that always includes The Strokes

events.name: RawBata
events.description: This is where charcoal becomes poetry. Think Japanese robata meets Athenian cool

events.name: Hermina Athens
events.description: Modern Greek god energy. If Lukas is gifting you something from here, youre special

events.name: Art Athina
events.description: International Contemporary Art Fair of Athens

events.name: Shamone Club
events.description: Extravagant Dance Club

events.name: Athens Jazz Festival
events.description: The citys longest-running music event

events.name: Grannys House
events.description: Retro, SecondHand, Antiques, Vintage glasses

events.name: Kowalski Bar Athens
events.description: Coffee, cocktails, lunch dinner with a quirky penguin mascot

events.name: Ohh Boy
events.description: Bright, clean, and effortlessly cool Ohh Boy is a neighborhood staple for minimalist design lovers and healthy brunch seekers. Bowls, smoothies, oat lattes, and gluten-free treats take center stage, all served in a pastel-perfect setting.

events.name: The Blind Spot Pangrati
events.description: Moody lighting, raw textures, and an industrial edge give this café its underground charm. A perfect mix of specialty coffee, hearty plates, and late-night energy. Hidden but only from those who dont know where to look.

events.name: L'Arrêt Du Temps
events.description: A slice of Paris in Athens. This charming café translates to The Stop of Time, and it truly delivers vintage chairs, French pastries, and slow mornings in the sun. Ideal for romantic daydreamers and journaling types.

events.name: Madania All Day Cafe
events.description: Stylish and sun-drenched, Madania feels like the living room of your most elegant friend. Locally sourced ingredients, earthy vibes, and a menu that travels across cuisines from hearty brunch to clean bites and cocktails.

events.name: Queen Bee Athens
events.description: Queen Bee is the polished queen of the Athenian brunch scene. With a sleek interior, Parisian pastries, and the crispiest eggs Benedict in town, its where the stylish meet for power breakfasts and slow weekend indulgence.

events.name: We Need Books
events.description: Athens first multilingual library, home to stories in over 60 languages. It's a cozy, inclusive space where the world comes together through words and culture

events.name: Dexameni Outdoor Cinema
events.description: Classic cinema under the stars in a stone-walled garden filled with jasmine. This open-air gem is a romantic nod to the golden age of Greek film

events.name: VIETNAM STREET FOOD
events.description: Nestled in the buzzing streets of Athens, Vietnam Street Food is a flavorful escape into Hanoi's vibrant markets. With sizzling woks, aromatic broths, and herbs that dance off the plate, this spot brings authentic Vietnamese soul to Greece

events.name: Lost
events.description: Lost is not just a place its a feeling. A dreamy bar-restaurant that wraps you in soft lights, velvet beats, and unforgettable flavors

events.name: BAR AMORE
events.description: A Roman-style spritzeria in the heart of Athens. Bar Amore is all about simple pleasures aperitivo, conversations that spill into the night, and the kind of vibe that makes you feel like youre in a Fellini film

events.name: Rizzari
events.description: Cozy and intimate, perfect for unplanned deep talks with strangers. They play ambient vinyl on Sundays.

events.name: Loukoumi Bar
events.description: Best view of the Acropolis without the tourist crowds. Hidden entrance like a treasure hunt.

events.name: Kafeneio to 111
events.description: Feels like a grandmas house. The coffee is strong and the conversations even stronger.

events.name: Riza Riza
events.description: Plants, records, good coffee, and chill people. A small creative jungle in the city.

events.name: Varnava Square
events.description: The pulse of Pagrati. Come here at 8PM, and youll meet half the neighborhood.

events.name: Colibri
events.description: Grunge atmosphere, killer burgers, and the beers come cold and fast.

events.name: Kinono
events.description: A bar with soul. Exhibits, discussions, weird music nights. Pure vibes.

events.name: Proveleggios
events.description: Post-industrial Athenian magic. Fusion food, exposed walls, and a cool crowd.

events.name: Cherchez la Femme
events.description: Old-school charm with a feminist twist. Ouzo and gossip under hanging bougainvillea.

events.name: The Brunchers
events.description: A local favorite that wears its name proudly. With towering pancake stacks, cheesy croque madames, and eggs every way imaginable, The Brunchers is loud, colorful, and full of life.

events.name: Tragos Modern Kafeneio
events.description: Housed in a dramatic, moody neoclassical building with a vintage bar, Tragos reinvents the Greek kafeneio with flair. Expect unexpected brunch options, rich textures, and a space that screams old-school Athenian glam with modern bite.

events.name: Sofis Eatery
events.description: A modern, plant-filled café escape, perfect for digital detox and earthy brunch. Everything here is beautifully plated, minimally processed, and clearly made with care. From chia bowls to smoked salmon tartines its a wellness getaway.

events.name: Fixers Coffee
events.description: A sleek, urban hideaway known for its coffee precision and fresh bakes. Fixers has the feel of a modern roastery with a barista team that takes their craft seriously but with friendly neighborhood charm.

events.name: Branch
events.description: A polished brunch hub with Scandi-inspired interiors and indulgent, comfort-forward dishes. Think soft buns, creamy eggs, and brioche everything. Ideal for weekday mornings or cozy Sunday recoveries.

events.name: East Coast Concept Store
events.description: Not just a brunch café a lifestyle. This airy, palm-framed space merges food, fashion, and coffee into one cool collective. Surf vibes meet Greek brunch culture with a healthy, punchy twist.

bandit_events.personal_tip: Try the natural orange wine and let the music take you on a journey. Perfect for an intimate night out
Order the lamb slow-cooked over the fire. It melts in your mouth and pairs perfectly with their house wine
The tonkotsu ramen is a must-try! If you love spice, ask for their secret chili oil
Check their calendar for exclusive openings and after-hours artist talks
Old-school Greek coffee brewed in sand, mixed with deep conversations with the owners about music and politics
Come hungry, leave inspired
The only place I allow himself meat. One souvlaki, one beer, one meaningful silence
Its a bar, but its also a metaphor
One rum drink and youre halfway to Havana. A ritual stop after every recording session
His second home: Rooftop films, post-rock concerts, and vinyl fairs
The courtyard café is where I write
Perfect place to edit photos quietly
Their filter coffee is cheaper than therapy
The most island in the city moment
Best street portraits were taken here
Once lived in the artist residency
Experimental fashion meets political commentary
Warm honey bombs camera in hand pure joy
The place she brings her dates to test their silence
Casual rooftop meetings with other creatives
Where bread meets rebellion
Electronic nights, jazz Sundays, rooftop cinema all in one brutalist dream
Where jazz meets performance meets absinthe
A cocktail bar dressed like 1925
Where rum becomes art and bartenders are philosophers
World-class cocktails with zero arrogance
The simplest street snack, done to perfection
Hidden cocktail bar with a Berlin vibe
For late-night negronis with an artsy crowd
My go-to for rare vinyls
Where I DJs from time to time
Second hand vintage
Vintage boutique shop
Vintage boutique shop
National Museum of Contemporary Art

This is my go-to hideaway when I want to get out of the buzz and into my own head. The vibe is super local, with eclectic vintage chairs and great natural light pouring through the windows. Their iced matcha is a must in summer, and the playlists are always on point. I usually bring my sketchbook here.
I feel alive here.
I come to Minu when I want to eat slow, think deep, and look like I live in a Scandinavian mood board.
If I want good food, cool beats, and someone to check out my sneakers - LOT 51 is the scene.
This place feels like Athens unplugged - cool, creative, and with a brunch that hits every note just right.
I come here when I want to feel like a local myself - the vibes, the drinks, the friendly faces. This is where the city breathes.
It's not just food here - it's inspiration. Come hungry, leave with ideas and a full stomach.
When I need a break from the fancy stuff and just want something damn good and satisfying - Just Made 33 is my move.
For the comfort food that tastes like your neighbors best-kept secret
Because no bandit leaves Athens without wearable art made with heart
For stylish brunches that become unforgettable nights
Because adults need a secret Asian playground too
French elegance for when bandits want to flirt with finesse
For the thrill of the vintage hunt bandits love rare treasures
Because rooftops are for rebels with views and no curfews
To sip, shop, and scheme their next beautiful rebellion
For espresso, elegance, and a touch of attitude just like them
Because food with a mission hits different and they eat with purpose
Because rare style never goes extinct and this is where bandits hunt for their fashion prey
Because every brunch plate here is a wild ride through Latin America with a Greek twist
Because no great story ever started with I went to bed early
Because nothing beats local flavors with a view of ancient greatness
Feels like walking through her dream closet
I stop here before every client meeting for fresh inspiration
The spot where I recharge with coffee and flips through indie art books
I don't skate, but I watch and sketch here
Bel Ray is a time machine disguised as a bar
My favorite table is the one by the window
Fast and flavorful Japanese street food
Great for upcycled fashion finds
Perfect for jazz lovers
Great combination of burgers and disco
Amazing Latin American brunch spot
Unique performance venue with great atmosphere
Traditional Greek dining with Acropolis views
An essential stop for anyone tracking Athens avant-garde
A mix of Greek and international artists with refined curation
Where you go to feel Athens breathe artists, poets, philosophers
Movies beneath the stars in a unique site within stone walls
Every bite takes them on a spicy street-side adventure in Hanoi without leaving Athens
For those dreamy nights when you want to disappear in the magic of flavors
Because love, spritzers, and no reservations are all a bandit really needs
Bandits dress up here to dine like royalty and taste the future of Greek cuisine
A second home for creatives
We do family nights here often
When I want souvlaki without the mess
Great for first dates or solo sketching with espresso
Hidden gem for digging records or chilling with locals
I love sketching here with a glass of Assyrtiko
I come here for creative inspiration
I sometimes teach there on Sundays
I bring all my international friends here
I found my signature jacket here
Go early they sell out
My Saturday ritual
I come to reset after long DJ sets
I DJ with their rare records
This is where I go when I want my pancakes tall, my coffee strong, and my vibe cooler than yours.
Because they don't wear trends - they wear stories. And cherries always top the look.
Because new skin is just old soul with better stitching and they wear it well.
Because Folk is where they brainstorm revolutions over oat lattes.
Because quiet confidence in food is the ultimate power move.
A charming old-school open-air cinema for watching black white classics
Athens rooftop secret for indie films
Go-to for contemporary art that speaks loud and honest
Self-care temple for traditional steam bath and deep exfoliation
Great for chrome finishes and deep tissue foot massages
Must try their pistachio gelato
Try the spicy tuna roll with sake on ice
Perfect spot for viewing the Acropolis at night
Always carry a blanket, a speaker, and a book
Go midweek and bring water
Grab one before every long ride
Just don't go on Sunday
Best seat: by the open window in winter
This is where I go when I want to spoil myself without blowing the credit card I call it my stylish therapy
I love the idea that every outfit here has a past life its like buying a story, not just a shirt
NewSkin is where I get my armor before hitting the streets raw, loud, and unapologetic
Call me a rat if you want I live for digging up the coolest fashion relics here
At King Kong, I always swing out with something bold its not just shopping, its a jungle adventure
This place reminds me that fashion can be fun, ethical, and full of character I always find a treasure here
Its where I go to fall in love with the past one outfit at a time
Sometimes I walk in with 20 and walk out with a whole new vibe its vintage by the kilo, baby
Brunch like you mean it. Its eggs on croissant, oat milk flat white, and people-watching perfection. Come hungry, leave enlightened
This is where food gets dressed up for a photoshoot. Even the pancakes have personality. If your taste is selective, your tables already waiting
Farm-to-table rooftop dining with Acropolis views
Perfect spot for sunset cocktails with romantic views
Great place to learn ceramic making with local instructors
Excellent risograph printing workshops
Beautiful handmade ceramics with minimalist design
Because chaos can be cozy and Viola gets the vibe just right
Because when bandits aim high, they do it with sushi, sake, and a skyline
Maria's favorite spot for warm Athenian nights, with the Parthenon view
This is my brunch moodboard in real life fresh, local, and full of color
Sometimes doing nothing is everything Lazy is where I hit pause in style
Its where I brunch like a streetwear model sharp, bold, and on point
When Athens gets loud, I come to Kyma salt in the air, brunch on the table
It feels like brunching at a cool friends place who just happens to be a chef
Akra is where I go when I want my brunch to taste like it came from a chefs dreams
Fred is my escape when I need peace, beauty, and a plate that matches my mood
Its where I go to eat well, meet friends, and pretend Im in an Italian market
Clean food, clean space, clean mind Goodhood is my urban wellness ritual
I come here when I want a flaky croissant and a little quiet magic in my day
If your brunch has a skincare routine, this is where it eats. Light, fresh, and totally camera-ready. Bonus: youll feel healthy just standing here
Its called the Blind Spot, but it sees you. Dark, sexy, and always a little mysterious. Come solo, bring a book or a lover
The name means time stops and it does. Order a croissant, pretend youre in Montmartre, and dont rush. Ever
You came for coffee, but youll stay for the glow. Its the kind of place where even the plants are having a better day than you
This is not a café. Its a status symbol in sourdough form. Put on something cute you never know who youll bump into here
Brunch here is not a meal, its a mission. Expect layers, sauces, and serious fork drop moments. Bring your appetite, and maybe a nap plan.
Feels like drinking espresso in a noir film. The vibe is low-lit drama, the food is high-impact. Youll want to linger with a Negroni and a notebook.
If your soul needs a reset, start here. Its calm, curated, and everything tastes like it came from a peaceful farm. Even the silence is organic.
These people know coffee like surgeons know scalpels. Sit by the window, grab a cruffin, and get fixed.
Its where the buns are soft and the playlists hit just right. Grab a seat by the round mirror it flatters everyone.
California dreams on Athenian streets. Avocado toast with attitude, and merch you didnt know you needed. Stay for the vibes, leave with a tote.
